titles.title: A bill to designate the post office located at 309 East Linn Street, Marshalltown, Iowa, as the "Major Scott Nisely Post Office".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7073)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 296.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
6/5/2007--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 309 East Linn Street, Marshalltown, Iowa, as the "Major Scott Nisely Post Office."
